content:
IImageStoreProgressHandler Interface

Definition

Defines the behavior that a progress handler must implement to process progress information from Image Store operations

In this Article

public interface IImageStoreProgressHandler

Methods

GetUpdateInterval()

Retrieves the interval at which progress information is published for some details that use polling (such as application package upload and download progress). Returning zero will use the system default of 2 seconds.
UpdateProgress(Int64, Int64, ProgressUnitType)

Reports the progress of the current operation
